Html:
Since there is an Android version, does this improve the chances of a Windows 8 and Windows 8 RT version of WabbitEMU?
I know an experimental build was made once to work on jail-broken Surface, but it would be much better if there'd be an official WabbitEMU Windows 8/RT app.

I take it, that's a no (?)
Too bad.

We'd like to do a Win RT version of Wabbitemu but its a big task. Writing it requires writing a complete new GUI which isn't trivial and we don't have experience writing Win RT apps.

BuckeyeDude
